name: TVHelper
0:
”Alexa, ask TV Helper where can I watch Game of Thrones”
”Alexa, ask TV Helper to recommend shows like Westworld”
”Alexa, ask TV Helper to recommend movies like The Parent Trap”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: t. v. helper
Developer Terms of Use
des: TV Helper helps you find out where your favorite shows and movies are streaming, or gives you recommendations based on your favorite shows. Find a show or movie by telling Alexa to "ask TV Helper where I can stream Pretty Little Liars" or "Ask TV Helper where I can watch The Godfather". Then get recommendations based on your favorite shows by asking TV Helper to 'recommend shows like The Flash", or even get recommendations based on you favorite actor, "recommend shows with Jennifer Lawrence". TV Helper is here to help you navigate the streaming landscape.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
